bot_welcome: Hi! I'm Group Attendance Bot. Add me to your group to mark attendance. Send /help to know more.
main_menu: Choose an option from below list
please_close_attendance: Please close the current attendance first
already_marked: You have already marked your attendance
attendance_over: Attendance is over. %{total} people marked attendance.
name: Name
can_not_change_while_in_progress: Can not change %{entity} while attendance is in progress
send_location:
Send your location, press /cancel to abort.

Current TimeZone: %{current_tz}
